query: Draft a professional email to schedule a team meeting for next Tuesday at 2 PM

args.subject: Team Meeting - Next Tuesday at 2 PM
args.body:
Dear Team,

I would like to schedule a team meeting for next Tuesday at 2 PM. Please let me know if you have any conflicts.

Best regards

ground_truth.expected_response: Email drafted and sent successfully to team members regarding the meeting next Tuesday at 2 PM.

query: Write an email to decline a vendor proposal politely

args.subject: Re: Vendor Proposal
args.body:
Dear [Vendor],

Thank you for submitting your proposal. After careful consideration, we have decided to pursue other options at this time. We appreciate your time and effort.

Best regards

ground_truth.expected_response: Email drafted and sent successfully declining the vendor proposal.

context: Vendor proposal received on Monday for office supplies, total cost $5,000

query: Send a project status update email to the client

args.subject: Project Status Update
args.body:
Dear [Client],

I'm writing to provide an update on the project. We are currently on track with our milestones and expect to complete Phase 1 by the end of this week.

Best regards

ground_truth.expected_response: Status update email drafted and sent successfully to the client.

context: Project is 60% complete, Phase 1 deadline is Friday, no major issues reported
